attributes.action: Theresa May must hand back her Vivienne Westwood frocks for her fracking stance
attributes.additional_details: Vivienne Westwood is an anti Fracking campaigner and Theresa May chose a Vivienne Westwood Designer outfit on the day she took over as PM and continues to wear Vivienne Westwood designed outfits
attributes.background: Vivienne Westwood's anti fracking views directly contradict Theresa May's blatant blackmail of householders in future fracking areas. Theresa May should hand back all clothing designed by Vivienne Westwood until such time that the Government change its views on Fracking.

rejection.details: The personal wardrobe of the Prime Minister is not the responsibility of the UK Government or the UK Parliament.
